pinyin: Ku4 er3 de2 Gong1 ren2 dang3

sentences.english: Under Mr. Kim's military-oriented rule, the Workers' Party has withered.
sentences.chinese: 根據金正日的軍事爲本規則，工人黨已經枯死。

sentences.english: Workers' Party (WP) reaching out to the constituents of Aljunied GRC.
sentences.chinese: 工人黨走訪阿裕尼集選區，接見選民。

sentences.english: The PKK has stepped up attacks after ending its unilateral cease-fire last month.
sentences.chinese: 庫爾德工人黨已加強其單方面停火結束上個月的攻擊。

sentences.english: If the Workers' Party comes in at the next election a lot of industry will be state-owned.
sentences.chinese: 如果工人黨下屆上臺執政，許多工業都將收爲國有。
